parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> TKOH

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> RTD

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enable landing gear wheel brakes for a helicopter.
* value 0: brakes off
* value 1: brakes on

* index 1: left wheels
* index 2: right wheels
* index 3: both sides
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>afm</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Informative</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>This command is implemented, but not fully supported.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> helicopterRTD '''setBrakesRTD''' [value, wheelIndex]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> helicopterRTD: [[ObjectRTD]] - helicopter
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> value: [[Number]] - value of the brakes
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> wheelIndex: [[Number]] - wheel index

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myHelicopterRTD [[setBrakesRTD]] [1, 3];</code>
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]</root>
